name: Magibot
description: Magibot combines the principles of a platform game and those of a strategy game. Wisely place the action blocks upstream before taking control of your character.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
